'''Viparyas''' are [[Material]]s found in the dream versions of [[Vanarana]] and the [[Grove of Dreams]]. They are used for gifting to [[Material-Collecting Aranara]].

==How to Obtain==
See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=387 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A flower without seeds.<br />Once the earth remembers, the Viparyas will bloom<br />The forests of Sumeru are the seedbed of dreams, and the [[Aranara|children of the forest]] spend a part of their lives walking in dreams. Some of them will later leave these forest dreams behind, but the forest will not forget them.|[[Archive]]}}

==Trivia==
* In the real version of [[Vanarana]], Viparyas are replaced by [[Padisarah]]s; in the [[Grove of Dreams]], they are replaced by [[Sweet Flower]]s.
** It is possible to pick both plants independently; picking one will not make the one in the other version of the location disappear.
